name: Gravity Guard PERFECT +
description:
Made for the little details (#bitsyjam) with #bitsy.

FEATURING:

  • 2 UNIQUE ENDINGS
  • A MODERATELY PROSPEROUS SOCIETY
  • AT LEAST 5 MINS OF "GAMEPLAY"
  • A REJECTION OF HARMONY

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Keyboard controls: Use WASD or arrow keys to move or interact with objects.
  • Touch Controls: swipe in the direction you wish to move or interact

Thanks to:

  •  #bitsysavior and #multicolorbitsy for making my life easier
  •  #beepbox for letting me throw together this "music" for the game
  •  #bitsymuseui allowing easy application of the "music"
